idea-plugin.name: Flutter Asset Viewer
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin for viewing and managing Flutter assets in your project.
Features: - View all images from Flutter packages - Quick search with real-time filtering - Click to preview images in IDE - Hover effects for better UX - Support for PNG, JPG, SVG formats
idea-plugin.change-notes:
v0.2.0: - Added image preview functionality - Click on any image to open in IDE viewer - Fixed initial package loading issue
v0.1.0: - Image listing functionality - Real-time search - Hover effects - Initial release
